context: Real estate investment firm evaluating acquisition of downtown commercial property for redevelopment

request.purpose: Acquisition and redevelopment of 50,000 sq ft commercial building
request.justification: Strong location fundamentals with 15% projected NOI growth over 5 years

decision_process.outcome: Confirmed $22 million fair market value with redevelopment potential
Approved with 10% equity investment and debt financing

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15% IRR over 7-year hold period with value-add redevelopment

lessons_learned: Comprehensive due diligence essential for commercial acquisitions, redevelopment strategy significantly impacts returns
